abstract: Quebec is one of the few places in the world where Pepsi holds a larger market share than Coca-Cola.
snippet: Quebec is one of the few places in the world where Pepsi holds a larger market share than Coca-Cola.
lead_paragraph: IN 1967 Charles de Gaulle created a media and diplomatic storm after he fueled Quebec’s separatism by shouting “Vive le Quebec libre!” from a balcony at Montreal’s city hall.

headline.main: In a Quebecer’s Heart, Pepsi Occupies a Special Place
headline.print_headline: In a Quebecer’s Heart, Pepsi Occupies a Special Place
